properties.entry: SELECT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.admin.webnovel.model.dao.AdminWebNovelDAO#adminSelectAllNovel()*/ A.WEB_NOV_NUM , A.WEB_NOV_TITLE , A.WEB_NOV_AUTHOR , A.WEB_NOV_INFORM , A.CATEGORY_CODE , A.WEB_NOV_PUBLISHER , A.DAY_OF_WEEK , A.WEB_NOV_IMG_LOCATION , A.FINISHED_OR_NOT , A.WEB_NOV_IS_OPEN FROM WEB_NOV_INFO A

INSERT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.admin.webnovel.model.dao.AdminWebNovelDAO#insertNewWebnovel()*/ INTO WEB_NOV_INFO A ( A.WEB_NOV_NUM , A.CATEGORY_CODE , A.WEB_NOV_TITLE , A.WEB_NOV_AUTHOR , A.WEB_NOV_PUBLISHER , A.WEB_NOV_INFORM , A.WEB_NOV_IMG_LOCATION , A.DAY_OF_WEEK , A.WEB_NOV_IS_OPEN ) VALUES ( SEQ_WEB_NOV_INFO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )

SELECT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.admin.webnovel.model.dao.AdminWebNovelDAO#adminSelectWebNovelDetail()*/ A.WEB_NOV_NUM , A.WEB_NOV_TITLE , A.WEB_NOV_AUTHOR , A.WEB_NOV_INFORM , A.CATEGORY_CODE , A.WEB_NOV_PUBLISHER , A.DAY_OF_WEEK , A.WEB_NOV_IMG_LOCATION , A.FINISHED_OR_NOT , A.WEB_NOV_IS_OPEN FROM WEB_NOV_INFO A WHERE A.WEB_NOV_NUM = ?
UPDATE WEB_NOV_INFO A SET A.WEB_NOV_IS_OPEN = ? WHERE A.WEB_NOV_NUM = ?
